details.description: Book and manage practical driving tests for your business, manage your business details, view statements and add or change approved driving instructor availability
details.alternative_title: Use the Driving Standards Agency (DSA) online business service
details.more_information:
The service is available to log in to from 6am to midnight.

You must be registered as a business or trainer booker with DSA to use the service.

You’ll need your:

  • user ID
  • password

Paying fees

You can pay any fees in 2 ways:

  • by debit or credit card
  • by debit from a pre-funded account

A pre-funded account lets you deposit funds with DSA in advance and pay the fee by debiting the amount directly from your account.

Apply for a pre-funded account

To apply for a pre-funded account, download the terms and conditions and the application form, sign both documents and send them to DSA.

Download ‘Use of pre-funded accounts for DSA services - terms and conditions’ (PDF, 88KB)

Download ‘Application form for the pre-funded account online business service’ (PDF, 71KB)


Driving Standards Agency
PO Box 280
Newcastle-upon-Tyne
NE99 1FP

Help with your pre-funded account

You can download the user guide to using a pre-funded account.

Download ‘Pre-funded accounts user guide’ (PDF, 138KB)

Help using the service

You can download the DSA online business service user guide if you need help using the service.

Download ‘DSA online business service user guide’ (PDF, 142KB)

Data protection

You can read the Data Protection Act 1998 fair processing notice for DSA before you start.

There’s a different process to book and manage practical tests in Northern Ireland.
details.introduction: Book and manage practical driving tests if you’re registered with the Driving Standards Agency (DSA). You can also manage your business details, view business statements and add or change approved driving instructor availability.

details.description: Becoming an instructor, applying for licences, booking tests and rules

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
Includes setting up test stations, employing drivers and becoming a vehicle operator

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
